Service Overview & Architecture.q1: Our service is a customer-facing REST API that handles user authentication and profile management. Main users are mobile and web applications.
Service Overview & Architecture.q2: Node.js with Express framework, PostgreSQL database, Redis for caching, deployed on Kubernetes.
Service Overview & Architecture.q3: Depends on Auth0 for SSO, SendGrid for emails, and AWS S3 for file storage. Critical dependency is the user database.

Monitoring & Observability.q4: We collect request latency, error rates, CPU/memory usage, database connection pool metrics.
Monitoring & Observability.q6: Using structured JSON logging with Winston, centralized in Elasticsearch for searching.
